column4: Hi all, just upgraded my PC with new cpu/mb/memory and ubuntu 12.04 64bit is running like a champ. I checked with google, and it said everything should be good to go with no reinstall. Can someone verify that or tell me it there's anything I still need to do please? Thanks.
if nothing is broken, no need to fix anything :-)
thanks! I am just overthinking I guess.
yeah, apt-get source libreoffice and build the package. Should give it a good stresstest :)
